propertyFields.name: authentication
propertyFields.description: Used for retrieving authorization header value

propertyFields.name: region
propertyFields.description: Region on which your Alert Notification's instance resides

propertyFields.name: axiosRequestConfig?
propertyFields.description: Used for overwriting the default configuration of the HTTP client

propertyFields.name: retryConfig?
propertyFields.description: Retry configuration, which enables the retriability of failed requests to Alert Notification

methods.name: create(type, data)
methods.description: Creates a single entity, which is of given _type_, with the given _data_ .

arguments.name: type - [EntityType](/configuration-api-objects/entity-type) (string)
arguments.description: type of the entity to be created

arguments.name: data - [Action](/configuration-api-objects/action) \| [Condition](/configuration-api-objects/condition) \| [Subscription](/configuration-api-objects/subscription)
arguments.description: data of the entity to be created

methods.name: update(type, data)
methods.description: Updates the single entity, which is of the given _type_, with the given _data_.

arguments.name: type - [EntityType](/configuration-api-objects/entity-type) (string)
arguments.description: type of the entity to be updated

arguments.name: data - [Action](/configuration-api-objects/action) \| [Condition](/configuration-api-objects/condition) \| [Subscription](/configuration-api-objects/subscription)
arguments.description: data of the entity to be updated

methods.name: get(type, name)
methods.description: Get a single entity with given _name_ of the given _type_

methods.name: getAll(type, params?)
methods.description: Get all entities of the given _type_, _params_ argument provides you the ability to change the pagination settings.

methods.name: delete(type, name)
methods.description: Deletes an entity with the given _name_ and of the given _type_.

methods.name: importConfiguration(data)
methods.description:
Imports a configuration.

_**Note:**_ Your current configuration will be **overwritten**.

methods.name: sendEvent(event)
methods.description: Will send an event for ingestion to Alert Notification.

arguments.name: event - [ResourceEvent](/event-api-objects/resource-event)
arguments.description: an event to be sent to Alert Notification

methods.name: sendEvents(events)
methods.description:
Will send multiple events at once for ingestion to Alert Notification.

_**Note:**_ They will be ingested in the order they are sent, starting from the first one.

arguments.name: events - [ResourceEvent](/event-api-objects/resource-event)[]
arguments.description: a collection of events to be sent to Alert Notification

methods.name: getMatchedEvent(eventId, params)
methods.description: Get a matched event with _eventId_ (received on response) from Alert Notification's store. You can filter the received events by supplying _params_ object.

arguments.name: eventId - (string)
arguments.description: event id generated by Alert Notification and returned upon send

arguments.name: params - [ConsumerQueryParams](/event-api-objects/consumer-query-parameters)
arguments.description: query parameters allowed when requesting Alert Notification's consumer API

methods.name: getMatchedEvents(params)
methods.description: Gets all matched events from Alert Notification's store. You can filter the received events by supplying _params_ object.

arguments.name: params - [ConsumerQueryParams](/event-api-objects/consumer-query-parameters)
arguments.description: query parameters allowed when requesting Alert Notification's consumer API

methods.name: getUndeliveredEvent(eventId, params)
methods.description: Get an undelivered event with _eventId_ (received on response) from Alert Notification's store. You can filter the received events by supplying _params_ object.

arguments.name: eventId - (string)
arguments.description: event id generated by Alert Notification and returned upon send

arguments.name: params - [ConsumerQueryParams](/event-api-objects/consumer-query-parameters)
arguments.description: query parameters allowed when requesting Alert Notification's consumer API

methods.name: getUndeliveredEvents(params)
methods.description: Get all undelivered events from Alert Notification's store. You can filter the received events by supplying _params_ object.

arguments.name: params - [ConsumerQueryParams](/event-api-objects/consumer-query-parameters)
arguments.description: query parameters allowed when requesting Alert Notification's consumer API
